topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551ae4e96368725960e90800#post_551ae4e96368725960e90800
Before this becomes a slapfight and a half I have to say something; there is no such thing as a patriachy or such.

There is no illuminati, there is no patriachy, nor do any single political power control the entire world; we're all utterly insignificant in every way, no one is in control and at the end of day every person on the planet is just on a rock hurtling through space without anyone in control.

People would rather have a asshole in charge than nobody in charge cause that gives them vindication with their life and makes them feel as though they can usurp the ruler or become the ruler, but in reality there is no king only chaos and uncertainty.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551ae9196368721e88780600#post_551ae9196368721e88780600
If you want me to get philosophical up in this bitch dog I would have to say that the human race's society is a macro scale entity comprised of smaller entities who in turn have a miniscule effect on the whole depending on their individuals accomplishments vs the whole and that the macro scale entity on a regular base goes through societal evolution due to technological advancements, ecological changes, economic changes, political changes and ideas promoted by the individual components that reach popularity instead of being ran by a singular group or entity and thusly is a entity in of itself.

!https://theanimistblog.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/adventure-line.jpg!
